thread.title: Doubts emerge about Aramco's international listing

title: Doubts emerge about Aramco's international listing
text:
Doubts emerge about Aramco's international listing 12:14pm EDT - 01:27 
Saudi Arabia is increasingly looking to float oil giant Saudi Aramco only locally as plans for an initial public offering on an international exchange such as London or New York hang in the balance, sources close to the process say. Sarah Charlton reports
